alert.note: Alert for Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Moore County through 330 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pinehurst, or 8 miles northwest of Southern Pines, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Whispering Pines, Pinebluff, Foxfire, Taylortown, Vass and Seven Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
